trX

private int trX(double realX)
Transform the x value. Given a real X value, translate it to a value x that will be plotted on the actual screen.
Parameters:
realX - the real x value
Returns:
x value that will be plotted

trY

private int trY(double realY)
Transform the y value. Given a real Y value, translate it to a value y that will be plotted on the actual screen.
Parameters:
realY - the real Y value
Returns:
y value that will be plotted

trYInv

private double trYInv(double plotY)
Transform the y value. Given the y-plot value, translate it to the original real y value, the inverse of trY().
Parameters:
plotY - the y-plot value
Returns:
real y value

trXInv

private double trXInv(double plotX)

plotX - the x-plot value
Returns:
real x value
